name: pulumi-argo
description: Utility to manipulate argo from Pulumi
author: ArgentumCode K.K.

scripts.build: go run code-gen.go > input.ts && eslint --fix input.ts && tsc
scripts.release: yarn build && git add dist/* --force && git commit -m "chore: release $npm_package_version" && git subtree split --prefix dist -b temporary && git tag v$npm_package_version temporary && git branch -D temporary && git push origin v$npm_package_version
